headline: Technical Details Behind a 400Gbps NTP Amplification DDoS Attack
keywords: NTP, Attacks, Tech Talks, Reliability, DDoS, Deep Dive
description: On Monday we mitigated a large DDoS that targeted one of our customers. The attack peaked just shy of 400Gbps. We've seen a handful of other attacks at this scale, but this is the largest attack we've seen that uses NTP amplification.
